text: Literally there's nothing in the mall.Only 2 levels.There were some which was open but it goes by appointments.U cant walk in and do ur nails or etc.The whole mall seems ulu esp at night.Toilets are not that clean tho.Cubicles are small as well.Although in google,it shows "shopping mall"',in reality,its nothing.Dont waste ur time going to this ulu and boring mall.

The toilet here for the males are both unlockable. Even the handicap toilet. Went from level 1 to level 2 toilet.
The flushing system of the toilet bowl are also dripping. Very unhygienic place! How does the male tenant pass motion here? I pooped in my pants and had to head back to jurong.

I am vendor here at Centropod for many years and we were given access to the swimming pool & the gym. However, the gym equipments were frequently not working. And I approached the building manager to inform him that the equipments were down due to a power trip (all power sockets could not be used). However, he was not helpful. He did not even attempt to render any help and just told me to not touch the equipments.
Small place with lots of empty shops comprising of small businesses owner.. Only 1 level of basement parking.
Quite confusing on the shop layout. Maybe a better directory might help.
